flawed_nl_solution:
From each tire repair, he made 20-5=$<<20-5=14>>14 profit
So repairs made him a profit of 14*300=$<<14*300=4200>>4200
The two complex repairs each made him 300-50=$<<300-50=250>>250 profit
So those added 250*2=$<<250*2=500>>500
So his total profit from everything was 4200+500+2000=$<<4200+500+2000=6700>>6700
So he made a profit of 6700-4000=$<<6700-4000=2700>>2700
#### 2700

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
